# thunder_ntp_auth_key (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}

resource "thunder_ntp_auth_key" "resourceNtpAuthKeyTest" {
  key      = 1
  alg_type = "SHA1"
  key_type = "ascii"
  asc_key  = "a"
}
```

### Optional

- `alg_type` (String)
- `asc_key` (String)
- `encrypted` (String)
- `hex_encrypted` (String)
- `hex_key` (String)
- `key` (Number)
- `key_type` (String)
- `uuid` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
